body.contents: The Hypixel Assets World is a consolidation of numerous official Hypixel lobbies and maps. You can navigate through them using the Warp Menu.
Several tools are included to aid in resource pack debugging and development, such as the Test World, creative inventory searching, and various functions.

contents: in the creative inventory, preferably with the relevant resource pack. Or try running
